comment: His class was unique.  He is stern, maybe a little too much so.  You will learn a lot.  DON'T come in late.  He will embarrass you!!! I would take him again but some days I didn't feel like listening to his drill sergeant style lectures.

Best teacher i have had all year. He is extremely stern. He may seem like a harda**, but he gets the job done, and teaches based upon a "been there, done that" situation, but in a good way. If you show up to lecture, and just listen, there is no need to take notes because it will be burned into your memory. 5/5
Very good teacher makes his class fun will help you if you neadd it.

His comments and advise will live with your for the rest of your life.  Amazing teacher and person.  Use him as a mentor.  Lots of corporate and book experience. Well travelled and opend minded. The class and project are tough, but you will learn a lot.  Attend class, read the book, and do a great project and you will do great.

Very knowledgeable teacher. Test are open book but are very hard so you still need to study. I received a C. in the class because I couldn't always study. If I studied more I would've received in A. Team project was fun.

Took him for Project management. I'll say this, He is tough, but fair, and at the end of the day, you will learn to respect his style of teaching and walk away learning something or not. I made a B out the class because test are open book, but the Long year project is a BITCH!. You better stay on your toes.

The tests are online and the answers are right in the book and easy to find. The group project is about as fun as a project can be, and he takes you through it step by step.  Attendance is mandatory, but his lectures are pretty intense, so at least its not boring. Def recommended if you just want an easy passing grade and to actually learn somethin
